title: Recapping The Stand: "The Stand"
itunes:title: Recapping The Stand: "The Stand"
itunes:subtitle: Our weekly coverage of The Stand on CBS All Access continues! Join Losers Randall Colburn, Michael Roffman, Jenn Adams, and Dan Caffrey as they head to court to give their verdict on the penultimate chapter. During recess, they discuss Lloyd's tur...
description:
Our weekly coverage of The Stand on CBS All Access continues! Join Losers Randall Colburn, Michael Roffman, Jenn Adams, and Dan Caffrey as they head to court to give their verdict on the penultimate chapter. During recess, they discuss Lloyd's turn from the pages, the big ol' dance party, the Trumpian parallels to Flagg, and the big bang out in the desert. As promised, there are Easter eggs uncovered.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
